com.att.cso.opendxl.jython.client.interfaces

Interface DxlListenerInterface


  • public interface DxlListenerInterface
    Simple interface to bridge Java and Python modules to listen for messages from DXL. Python modules should import this interface. i.e. from com.att.cso.opendxl.jython.client.interfaces import DxlProviderInterface Should be at the top of your python source file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String start(java.lang.String configFile, java.lang.String topic, DxlCallbackInterface dxlCallback)
      Provider start method to run the event listener, method does not return until the listener is stopped.
      void stop()
      Stop the listener and destroy the connection to the DXL fabric

    • Method Detail

      • start

        java.lang.String start(java.lang.String configFile,
                       java.lang.String topic,
                       DxlCallbackInterface dxlCallback)
                throws DxlJythonException
        Provider start method to run the event listener, method does not return until the listener is stopped.
        Parameters:
        configFile - location of the dxlclient.config file
        topic - topic name ("/my/service/foo/bar")
        dxlCallback - java callback implementation to process message payload
        Returns:
        message that indicates reason for exiting the implementer
        Throws:
        DxlJythonException - Thrown when unable to create a connection and start a listener

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop the listener and destroy the connection to the DXL fabric
